message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.RO, cs.HC 

This paper is likely to belong to the computer vision (cs.CV) sub-category as it deals with image processing and depth estimation. It could also belong to the graphics (cs.GR) sub-category as it involves perspective shift and camera aperture adjustment. Additionally, it could be categorized under multimedia (cs.MM) as it deals with capturing and processing light fields. Robotics (cs.RO) is another possible sub-category as it involves depth estimation, which is important for robotic applications. Finally, human-computer interaction (cs.HC) is a possible sub-category as light field imaging has potential applications in virtual and augmented reality, which are areas of interest in HCI.
